name: Tier 4 Spell Critical Hits (Levels 13-20)
description: Critical hit effects for spell attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Legendary effects for legendary adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical spell deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Arcane Annihilation - Magical fire engulfs the target eternally. They take 3d8 damage at the start of each turn until Dispel Magic (DC 17) or similar is cast.
Magic Destruction - Your spell permanently disrupts the target's magic. They cannot cast spells until Remove Curse or similar is cast.
Apocalyptic Blast - The force sends the target flying 60 feet, prone, stunned for 1 round, and takes 2d6 force damage.
Elemental Apocalypse - Your spell's element utterly overwhelms the target. Add 4d6 damage of the spell's type.
Permanent Vulnerability - The target becomes permanently vulnerable to the spell's damage type until Remove Curse is cast.
Twin Spell - Your spell echoes with legendary power. Cast the same spell again immediately as a free action, at the same level.
Arcane Mastery - Your spell is cast with legendary efficiency. Regain 1 expended spell slot up to 6th level.
